專.definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose; focused on one thing; special; expert; particular (to sth); concentrated; specialized

專人.definition: specialist; person appointed for specific task

專任.definition: full-time; to appoint sb to a specific task

專八.definition: TEM-8 or Test for English Majors-Band 8, highest level proficiency test for English major students in PRC (abbr. for 英語專業八級考試|英语专业八级考试[Ying1 yu3 Zhuan1 ye4 Ba1 ji2 Kao3 shi4])

專列.definition: special train; abbr. for 專門列車|专门列车[zhuan1 men2 lie4 che1]

專利.definition: patent; sth uniquely enjoyed (or possessed etc) by a certain group of people; monopoly

專區.definition: area established for a designated purpose; (PRC subprovincial administrative region 1949-1975) prefecture

專司.definition: to work solely on; to have as one's (or its) sole function; person or agency responsible for one specific thing

專屬.definition: to belong or be dedicated exclusively to; proprietary; private; personal

專征.definition: to go on a personal punitive expedition

專心.definition: to focus one's attention; to concentrate on (doing sth)

專擅.definition: without authorization; to act on one's own initiative

專攻.definition: to specialize in; to major in

專斷.definition: to act arbitrarily; to make decisions without consulting others

專業.definition: specialty; specialized field; main field of study (at university); major; CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]; professional

專業戶.definition: rural household that specializes in a particular type of product; (fig.) specialist

專櫃.definition: sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)

專款.definition: special fund; money allocated for a particular purpose

專治.definition: (of medicine) to use specifically for the treatment of

專注.definition: to focus; to concentrate; to give one's full attention

專營.definition: to specialize in (a particular product or service); monopoly

專營店.definition: exclusive agency; franchised shop; authorized store

專用集成電路.pinyin: zhuan1 yong4 ji2 cheng2 dian4 lu4

專科.definition: specialized subject; branch (of medicine); specialized training school

專科學校.definition: specialized school; college for professional training; polytechnic

專管.definition: to be in charge of something specific

專線.definition: special-purpose phone line or communications link; hotline; special rail line (e.g. between airport and city); CL:條|条[tiao2]

專美於前.definition: to monopolize the limelight (idiom); to get all the glory; to rank highest

專職.definition: special duty; assigned full time to a task

專訪.definition: to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic); special interview; special report based on such an interview

專車.definition: special (or reserved) train (or bus etc); limousine; private car used as a taxi and booked via a smartphone app

專輯.definition: album; record (music); special collection of printed or broadcast material

專遞.definition: to make a special delivery; to courier

專題.definition: specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc); article, report or program etc on a specific topic
